channel.title: SeaX on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.

item.title: Welcome to SeaX, a Collaborative Cloud Contact Center
item.description: In this blog we will introduce SeaX, our cloud communication contact center solution.

item.title: Discord (3/3): Discord & Twilio Flex: Bringing Flex Contact Center into Uncharted Territory
item.description: This is our last post in a three-part series about customer engagement on Discord.

item.title: Discord (2/3): How to Create a Discord Community and Bot for Your Brand
item.description: Our blog post, “Discord: A New Frontier for Customer Engagement”, covered Discord’s rise in popularity, and how brands can capitalize on this new social platform to form their own online communities and engage with customers.

item.title: Discord (1/3): A New Frontier for Customer Engagement
item.description: Discord’s user numbers have soared in recent years and the platform has now rebranded itself as the ‘home for your communities and friends’.

item.title: AI-Enabled Contact Center Automation: Virtual Agent Collaboration with CRM
item.description: Integrating HubSpot with SeaX Easy and seamless access to both your contact center interface and your customer data in a CRM is vital to efficient customer support.
